name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Google Knowledge Graph Search
description: This is a repository of google knowledge graph search APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Google Knowledge Graph Search
apis.description: The Knowledge Graph Search API lets you find entities in the Google Knowledge Graph. The API uses standard schema.org types and is compliant with the JSON-LD specification. Some examples of how you can use the Knowledge Graph Search API include: Getting a ranked list of the most notable entities that match certain criteria. Predictively completing entities in a search box. Annotating/organizing content using the Knowledge Graph entities.
